column5: A friend has a Mustang floater coat labelled"Cruiser Class" and I cannot seem to find any info on them.I am considering buying it from him but would like to know if ity is suitable for me or not.He knows nothing about it since it belonged to his brother who is now overseas.  Any help would be appreciated.  Chance
Try this.  Contact Customer Service Monday- Friday, 7am - 4:30pm PST [emailÂ protected] North America Phone: 1.800.526.0532 Fax: 1.888.676.5014
Thanks I will give them a call,tried an  mail a few days ago with no answer so hopefully a call will get some results.
Here's a link...not a lot of info...but it seems this company calls the Mustang line of suits "Cruiser" suits.  http://www.methodmarine.com/resources/8.+Method+Marine+clothing+Catalog.pdf

I called right now. It says they are currently closed. Try calling during their regular hours.Mon-Fri 7 to 4.  The only problem is today is Tuesday and its 10 am.lol  I had a hard time surfing the site too and finding survival suits, since the suits are classified under work suits?  Doesn't look like they have anything in camo.
Here's a direct link for the model 185, 195 and 2195. http://www.mustangsurvival.com/products/category.php?t=2
Thanks. I had already found them under work suits. I'm looking at the ms-195 or ms-195 HD. None of them have built in boots.
